segments.text: So what's wrong with the drain ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's clogged and water won't go down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me take a look . You know why ? It's clogged with hair . No wonder water won't go down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I guess people who lived here before didn't clean the bathtub .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry . I ’ Ve got some acid here . It will help dissolve the hair down there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now you know you have to clean your bathtub every time when you use it .
segments.speaker: S1
